statements: SELECT * FROM user_credentials;
SELECT username, created_on FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM user_credentials WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE created_on > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_credentials ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials;
SELECT username, created_on FROM user_credentials ORDER BY created_on DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_credentials WHERE created_on > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE username LIKE 'john%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_credentials;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT username, user_id FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT MIN(user_id) AS min_id, MAX(user_id) AS max_id FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users LEFT JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT u.username, ur.role_name, up.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.role_id = ur.role_id JOIN user_permissions up ON ur.permission_id = up.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT email_address, verified FROM email WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT phone_number FROM phone WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, expiration FROM session WHERE token = 'abc123';
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email_id, email_address, verified FROM email WHERE verified = TRUE;
SELECT phone_id, phone_number, user_id FROM phone ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM session WHERE expiration > NOW();
SELECT user_id, session_id, token FROM session JOIN users ON session.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE id = 1;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_role_mapping urm ON u.id = urm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON urm.role_id = r.id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.id = rp.role_id JOIN user_permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';

SELECT u.username, ur.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_role_mapping urm ON u.id = urm.user_id JOIN user_roles ur ON urm.role_id = ur.id JOIN role_permissions rp ON ur.id = rp.role_id JOIN user_permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_role_mapping urm ON u.id = urm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON urm.role_id = r.id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.id = rp.role_id JOIN user_permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE u.id = 1;
